data - Variable in record class it.polimi.worker.models.Data
The field for the data record component.
data() - Method in record class it.polimi.worker.models.Data
Returns the value of the data record component.
Data - Record Class in it.polimi.worker.models
The Data class is a record used to store the data read from HDFS and the end flag which indicates if there is no more data to read.
Data(String, boolean) - Constructor for record class it.polimi.worker.models.Data
Creates an instance of a Data record class.
deleteCheckpoints(String) - Method in class it.polimi.worker.CheckPointManager
The deleteCheckpoints method deletes the checkpoint files.
deleteEmptyDirectory(File) - Static method in class it.polimi.worker.CheckPointManager
The deleteEmptyDirectory method deletes the empty directory.
deleteFiles(String, Boolean) - Method in class it.polimi.coordinator.HadoopCoordinator
This method deletes the files from HDFS.
determineNewAssignmentsWithLoadBalancing() - Method in class it.polimi.coordinator.KeyAssignmentManager
The determineNewAssignmentsWithLoadBalancing method determines the new worker assignments with load balancing and sets the canProceed flag to true.
downloadAndAppendToMergedFile(String, OutputStream) - Method in class it.polimi.coordinator.HadoopCoordinator
This method downloads and appends the file to the final csv.
